## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution">Distribution</a> of unscaled probability weight.

<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/distribution">Distribution</a> of unscaled probability weight to a set of successors.

This class collates the successor edge weights for later processing.

<em>DidOverflow</em> indicates whether <em>Total</em> did overflow while adding to the distribution. It should never overflow twice.

Definition at line 385 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/blockfrequencyinfoimpl-h">BlockFrequencyInfoImpl.h</a>.

### normalize() {#ac24f62f9ac4bff8273ed15798ea650e8}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="void Distribution::normalize ()">
Normalize the distribution.

Combines multiple edges to the same <em><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/blockfrequencyinfoimplbase/weight/#a7d49b2704586051c51172cc77d4104b3">Weight::TargetNode</a></em> and scales down so that <em>Total</em> fits into 32-bits.

This is linear in the size of <em>Weights</em>. For the vast majority of cases, adjacent edge weights are combined by sorting <a href="#a3009a397a01cea6f6903433da6683224">WeightList</a> and combining adjacent weights. However, for very large edge lists an auxiliary hash table is used.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/blockfrequencyinfoimpl-h/#l00415">415</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/blockfrequencyinfoimpl-h">BlockFrequencyInfoImpl.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp/#l00236">236</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/blockfrequencyinfoimpl-cpp">BlockFrequencyInfoImpl.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
